short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Q.wiki Connect is a browser extension that allows you to quickly and easily find references to Q.wiki pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Q.wiki Connect connects Q.wiki with your browser and suggests helpful content from Q.wiki for the websites you are currently visiting. No matter where you navigate, Q.wiki Connect checks whether relevant knowledge can be provided and prioritizes the content according to direct and indirect hits. This gives you customized assistance without having to search for information.
